snippet: About 5,000 people were evacuated from a town in eastern Tennessee after a single train car derailed and burst into flames.
abstract: CSX freight train carrying flammable toxic chemical acrylonitrile derails and bursts into flame in eastern Tennessee, forcing evacuation of some 5,000 people from nearby town of Maryville.
lead_paragraph: About 5,000 people were evacuated from a town in eastern Tennessee after a single train car derailed and burst into flames.

headline.main: Train Carrying Toxic Substance Derails in Tennessee
headline.print_headline: National Briefing | South; Tennessee: 5,000 Evacuated and 52 Are Treated After Spill
